column4: On Breezy is there a way to install/set up/use differnt cursors then the default, if so, how? I haven;t been able to figure it out yet
I have several but I can;t figure out how to add more or chose differnt ones then the default
I also have an intrst in installing Qemu, Is this the place to ask for help on how to do that or should I try another channel?
sudo apt-get install qemu should work!
if you'd rather compile from source, it's a bit more difficult
vmware workstation is an excellent product
you need to download it from their website. It is a commercial app with a free trial licence.
it is worth the money if you are serious about virtualisation
this is not an easy task
i can talk you through, if you want
i'm not sure which repository they are in...
try searching for linux-headers in synaptic
i'll need to finish this as sleep is calling. You can /lastlog later
